titleNullable: COVID-19 X-Ray Dataset With Preprocessed Images
subtitleNullable: COVID-19 image data collection With preprocessed and denoised images
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset is inspired by COVID-19 Radiography Database by Tawsifur Rahman and others and Joseph Paul Cohen and Paul Morrison and Lan Dao's chest Xray dataset (https://github.com/ieee8023/covid-chestxray-dataset) datasets.
 
**This Dataset was used in "InstaCovNet-19: A deep learning classification model for the detection of COVID-19 patients using Chest X-ray"**(https://doi.org/10.1016/j.asoc.2020.106859)


### Content

This dataset contains images that are not preprocessed at all under **CovidDataset folder**, Images where noise reduction using the fuzzy color technique (https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-7908-1847-5_10) is applied under  **Fuzzy folder**, Images where we stacked both the un-preprocessed dataset and preprocessed dataset under **Stacking folder**.
Each Folder is divided into 2 subfolders- Train and Val  Containing training and validation set (You have to combine both the folders if you want to divide them again using your custom distribution)
Each Sub-Folder has 3 more sub-folders dividing the dataset into 3 classes (COVID, Normal, Pneumonia).
# Unpreprocessed Image
![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F4291946%2F7cdbfaa1053e45259027de60a048a76b%2FNonCov.png?generation=1594475104373167&alt=media)


# Preprocessing Fuzzy Color Technique
![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F4291946%2Ff46952a911530aa2ee58c57bfad8335a%2FFuzzyCov.png?generation=1594475178755533&alt=media)


# Stacking
![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F4291946%2Fe092d3c2f54ed48d716250120b410734%2FStackedCov.png?generation=1594475276300666&alt=media)



### References
[1] S.I. S. o. M. a. I. Radiology. (2020). COVID-19 Database. Available: https://www.sirm.org/category/senza-categoria/covid-19/
[2] Joseph Paul Cohen and Paul Morrison and Lan Dao, "COVID-19 image data collection", arXiv:2003.11597, 2020 https://github.com/ieee8023/covid-chestxray-dataset.
[3]  COVID-19 Radiography Database by Tawsifur Rahman and others). Available: https://www.kaggle.com/tawsifurrahman/covid19-radiography-database
title: COVID-19 X-Ray Dataset With Preprocessed Images
subtitle: COVID-19 image data collection With preprocessed and denoised images
description:
### Context

This dataset is inspired by COVID-19 Radiography Database by Tawsifur Rahman and others and Joseph Paul Cohen and Paul Morrison and Lan Dao's chest Xray dataset (https://github.com/ieee8023/covid-chestxray-dataset) datasets.
 
**This Dataset was used in "InstaCovNet-19: A deep learning classification model for the detection of COVID-19 patients using Chest X-ray"**(https://doi.org/10.1016/j.asoc.2020.106859)


### Content

This dataset contains images that are not preprocessed at all under **CovidDataset folder**, Images where noise reduction using the fuzzy color technique (https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-7908-1847-5_10) is applied under  **Fuzzy folder**, Images where we stacked both the un-preprocessed dataset and preprocessed dataset under **Stacking folder**.
Each Folder is divided into 2 subfolders- Train and Val  Containing training and validation set (You have to combine both the folders if you want to divide them again using your custom distribution)
Each Sub-Folder has 3 more sub-folders dividing the dataset into 3 classes (COVID, Normal, Pneumonia).
